code:
flowchart TB
  src --> apps
  src --> common
  src --> modules
  src --> protocols
  src --> schemas

  subgraph apps
    api[api-gateway]
  end

  subgraph common
    cache[cache.service]
    circuit[circuit-breaker.service]
    consul[consul.service]
    cqrs[cqrs/]
    dbconf[database.config]
    email[emailing.service]
    env[environment.validation]
    ff[feature-flags.service]
    health[health.service]
    http[http-client.service]
    jaeger[jaeger.service]
    logger[logger.config]
    messaging[messaging/]
    mongo[mongodb.service]
    otel[opentelemetry]
    prisma[prisma.service]
    storage[storage/]
  end

  subgraph modules
    auth[auth/]
    users[users/]
  end

  subgraph protocols
    grpc[grpc/]
    https[https.service]
    mqtt[mqtt.service]
    ws[websocket.gateway]
  end

  subgraph schemas
    gql[graphql.schemas]
    openapi[openapi.schemas]
    kafka[kafka.schemas]
  end
repo_description: NestJs/Node.js backend template, multi-protocol and microservice design patterns support.
